name: The Necromancer's Tower
description:
Strike down the fools who approach your Necromantic Tower!  Raise the dead to fight for you!

A Game Maker's Toolkit Jam 2018 entry.  A Tower Defense game in which there is no upgrade progression or classic tower placement.

Left Click to Kill your foes!

Right Click to Revive them!

The more health your spells effect, the longer they individually take to recharge!
